articles.title: Man City get early team news update ahead of Crystal Palace trip as 14 youngsters train - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City held a light training session on Thursday after drawing with Sporting and ahead of the Premier League trip to Crystal Palace.
articles.content:
Manchester City called up 14 young players to training on Thursday as preparations began for the Premier League trip to Crystal Palace on Monday.
